detail_desc: Two pairs of all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline and a concealed zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. One patterned pair.

Two pairs of all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline and a concealed zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. One patterned pair.

Joggers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Joggers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative press-studs and a zip at the cuffs. Zipped side pockets, a small front pocket with a flap and press-stud, and a detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Lined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in cotton twill with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in cotton twill with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Fitted body in ribbed cotton jersey with a ballerina neckline, short sleeves and lined gusset with press-studs.
Fitted body in ribbed cotton jersey with a ballerina neckline, short sleeves and lined gusset with press-studs.
Fitted jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a small stand-up collar and a zip at the top. Decorative seams at the front and long raglan sleeves with narrow ribbing at the cuffs.
Boat-neck jumper in a fine knit with buttons on the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boat-neck jumper in a fine knit with buttons on the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine-knit viscose blend with a sheen. V-neck, pearly buttons down the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Trousers in soft Tencel™ modal twill with a regular waist, detachable tie belt and belt loops with a decorative button. Zip fly and button, patch front pockets, back pockets, and gently tapered legs with one flap pocket and one jetted pocket.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a square neckline front and back, smocked bodice and long puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the shoulders and cuffs.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a square neckline front and back, smocked bodice and long puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the shoulders and cuffs.

Pull-on shorts in washed cotton denim with an elasticated waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Pull-on shorts in washed cotton denim with an elasticated waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in soft, crinkled jersey with flounces down the top, a gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is organic.

Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.

Fitted tops in stretch, organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline and long sleeves.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a cut-out section and covered metal ring at the front. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side.
Short, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck, long sleeves, seam at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Waist bag in woven fabric with contrasting colour details and an elastic strap with a plastic fastener at the front that can also be used to adjust the size of the bag. Zip with two tabs at the top, one large compartment with an inner pocket and one zipped outer compartment. Adjustable waist belt with lightly padded straps and a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 8x13x23 cm.
Joggers in soft, washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Joggers in soft, washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Ankle-length boiler suit in a crêpe weave with a resort collar, chest pockets and buttons down the front. Elasticated seam at the waist, half-length sleeves and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
V-neck jumper in a rib knit with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
V-neck jumper in a rib knit with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with an all-over print and brushed finish. Round neckline and long sleeves.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with an all-over print and brushed finish. Round neckline and long sleeves.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton. Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and print stripes down the sides of the legs.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton. Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and print stripes down the sides of the legs.

Blouse in an airy weave with a high, double-layered collar with gathered seams and decorative pleats, and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Double-layered yoke with gathers to create width, long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, cuffs with decorative pleats and covered buttons, and a straight-cut hem.

Blouse in an airy weave with a high, double-layered collar with gathered seams and decorative pleats, and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Double-layered yoke with gathers to create width, long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, cuffs with decorative pleats and covered buttons, and a straight-cut hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print and reversible sequin motif (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.

Ankle-length trousers in crisp cotton seersucker. High paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Ankle-length trousers in crisp cotton seersucker. High paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

V-neck jumpsuit in a patterned weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Seam at the waist with a tab and button at the sides, 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs, and straight, ankle-length legs.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Tapered waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Tapered waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Tapered waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Fully lined bikini with an all-over print. Top with a flounced front section and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Bottoms with a flounce at the top.

Jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted sections on the shoulders and at the lower back. Stand-up collar with a press-stud, and a zip down the front. Zipped chest and front pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, flounce at the top and medium coverage at the back.
Elasticated bracelets in various styles with wooden beads.

Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.

Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.

Weekend bag in woven fabric with contrasting colour details. Two handles, a zip and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap at the top. Adjustable tabs on the short sides that can be used to adjust the size of the bag. One outer compartment at the front and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 22x31x48 cm.
Knee-length dress in a fine rib knit with a V-neck, long sleeves and a slit in one side.
